description: ff. 223. 204 x 150; 150 x 100 mm. 17 lin. 19th cen. An account of his travels, visions, and association with the Rifāʻīyah, with numerous poems. Incip.: ... الحمد لله اتم الحمد ... اما بعد ... هذه کلمات انشقت عنها ستور اسرار
author: Rawwās, Muḥammad Mahdī ibn ʻAlī, 1805 or 6-1870 or 71.
title: Bawāriq al-ḥaqāʼiq.
creator: Rawwās, Muḥammad Mahdī ibn ʻAlī, 1805 or 6-1870 or 71.
